comment: Tell them that youre an unhinged member of The Rethithtance and that homeschooling is a better option for them. Numpty.
amr:
# ::snt Tell them that youre an unhinged member of The Rethithtance and that homeschooling is a better option for them. Numpty.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / tell-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (o / organization
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "The"
                                          :op2 "Rethithtance"))
                              :ARG2 (m2 / member))
                        :ARG1-of (u / unhing-00)
                        :domain (y2 / you))
                  :op2 (o2 / opt-01
                        :ARG0 (t2 / they)
                        :ARG1 (h2 / homeschool-01)
                        :ARG1-of (h3 / have-degree-91
                              :ARG2 (g / good-04
                                    :ARG1 o2
                                    :ARG2 t2)
                              :ARG3 (m3 / more))))
            :ARG2 t2)
      :snt2 (n2 / numpty))

# ::snt SCREAM AT THE SKY SOYBOY!
(c / cheer-on-04
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (g / game
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "SKY")))

comment: There are much more appropriate terms that should be used to replace the foul language.
amr:
# ::snt There are much more appropriate terms that should be used to replace the foul language.
(r / recommend-01
      :ARG1 (u / use-01
            :ARG1 (t / term
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                        :ARG2 (a / appropriate-02
                              :ARG1 t)
                        :ARG3 (m / more
                              :quant (m2 / much))))
            :ARG2 (r2 / replace-01
                  :ARG1 (l / language
                        :mod (f / foul))
                  :ARG2 t)))

comment: Hate speech is not tolerated on Reddit. You can feel free to email a Moderator concerning your account bans. Thank you, have a nice day.
amr:
# ::snt Hate speech is not tolerated on Reddit. You can feel free to email a Moderator concerning your account bans. Thank you, have a nice day.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / tolerate-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (s / speak-01
                  :ARG1 (h / hate-01))
            :location (p / publication
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Reddit")))
      :snt2 (p2 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (f / feel-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (f2 / free-04
                        :ARG1 y
                        :ARG3 (e / email-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG2 (p3 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (m2 / moderate-02))
                              :ARG3 (b / ban-01
                                    :ARG1 (a / account
                                          :poss y))))))
      :snt3 (a2 / and
            :op1 (t2 / thank-01
                  :ARG1 (y2 / you))
            :op2 (h2 / have-03
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 (d / day
                        :ARG1-of (n2 / nice-01)))))
